activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity serves as the initial screen that users see when the app is launched. It prepares the transition to the main application by initializing settings and then starts the MainActivity to continue the user experience.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.MainActivity
activities.summary: The MainActivity serves as the primary interface for the dialer application, managing contacts, call history, and settings. It handles user interactions, updates the UI, and coordinates the display of various fragments for different functionalities such as contacts, favorites, and recents.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.AboutActivity
activities.summary: The 'AboutActivity' is designed to provide information about the application, including its features, licenses, and credits. It typically includes static content or links to external resources.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.CustomizationActivity
activities.summary: CustomizationActivity provides a user interface for customizing various settings and preferences for the application.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.ManageBlockedNumbersActivity
activities.summary: The com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.ManageBlockedNumbersActivity is an activity designed to manage blocked numbers in the app, providing functionalities to view, add, and remove blocked contacts.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.ManageSpeedDialActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the root layout for the activity, providing the overall structure and containing all other UI components.
displays the title 'Manage speed dial' and includes a navigation icon (arrow) for returning to the previous screen.
enables vertical scrolling through the speed dial list within the activity.
holds all the views that make up the speed dial management interface, including the text label and the list of speed dials.

static_properties.text: Click on a number to assign a contact to it. You can then quickly call the given contact by long pressing the given number at the dialer.

dynamic_property.effect: provides instructions to the user on how to assign contacts to speed dial numbers.
displays the speed dial entries in a list format, allowing users to select, edit, or delete entries.
serves as the root layout for the activity, providing the overall structure and containing all other UI components.
displays the title 'Manage speed dial' and includes a navigation icon (arrow) for returning to the previous screen.
enables vertical scrolling through the speed dial list within the activity.
holds all the views that make up the speed dial management interface, including the text label and the list of speed dials.

static_properties.text: Click on a number to assign a contact to it. You can then quickly call the given contact by long pressing the given number at the dialer.

dynamic_property.effect: provides instructions to the user on how to assign contacts to speed dial numbers.
displays the speed dial entries in a list format, allowing users to select, edit, or delete entries.

activities.summary: The 'ManageSpeedDialActivity' allows users to manage and customize their speed dial entries. Users can add, remove, and assign contacts to speed dial numbers, with the ability to select specific phone numbers from a contact with multiple entries.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.ConferenceActivity

dynamic_property.effect: acts as a parent layout for other UI elements.
displays a navigation icon (arrow) when the activity is in focus.
acts as an additional container for UI elements, if any.
displays a list of conference calls, allowing users to scroll through and interact with them.
acts as a parent layout for other UI elements.
displays a navigation icon (arrow) when the activity is in focus.
acts as an additional container for UI elements, if any.
displays a list of conference calls, allowing users to scroll through and interact with them.

activities.summary: The ConferenceActivity is designed for managing conference calls. It initializes UI components, configures a list adapter for displaying conference calls, and sets up a navigation toolbar for user interaction.

static_properties.text: Enable vibrations on dialpad button clicks
Enable beeps on dialpad button clicks
Open the dialpad by default when the app opens
Group subsequent calls with the same number at the call log
Replace swiping at responding to incoming calls with clicking
Always display incoming calls on full screen
